texto: views should include: 1) process view name; 2) process view purpose; 3) process view outcomes; and 4) identification and description of the processes, activities and tasks that implement the process view, and references to the sources for these processes, activities and tasks in other standards. NOTE The requirements for documenting viewpoints are found in ISO/IEC/IEEE 42010:2011, 5.4.
